attributes.action: Region free Blu-ray and DVD discs and players
attributes.additional_details:
Across the world the same item is charged at many different rates and a region code used to exploit the lucrative market places.
When you can purchase a DVD in the USA or Asia far cheaper than you can in EU and the UK then I believe it is an unfair practise and designed to profit unfairly for the same product - it is surely against price fixing!
